attributes.action: go back to basics within education. Only teach up to Primary school children English, Science and Maths.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Only teach Primary school children the basics. Forget about I.T, R.E, ART, HISTORY ETC.
Teach them English, Maths and Science and only that. When they start to attend secondary school in the first couple of years they can then start to learn other subjects.
Teachers are having to spread the school day very thin due to many other lessons.
